EmailTemplate.name: 07-29-21 HOS eWeekly Newsletter.Can you tell fact from fiction?
EmailTemplate.subject: Can you tell fact from fiction?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: July 29, 2021 Can you tell fact from myth? We all love working with the restaurants, but no matter how long you’ve been in the industry, you may have believed some of these myths along the way. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> How can restaurants relate to Gen Z? From Baby Boomers to Gen Z, help your customers reach everyone with buying power. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
